description: You and yours can take pictures Santa at Town Center at Cobb mall. Santa photo packages start at $24.99, but put down $10 and reserve a spot.
title: Head to Town Center at Cobb for pictures with Santa
title_page: Head to Town Center at Cobb for pictures with Santa
text:
Santa's here, y'all.
You and yours can take pictures with the bearded man himself at Town Center at Cobb in Kennesaw. He got to the mall Nov. 4.
Santa photo packages start at $24.99, but put down $10 early and reserve a spot.
If you'd rather catch him when he's in Marietta, do so at the downtown skating rink. Find out how here.
Santa will be ready for his close-up through the day before Christmas because he's got stuff to do. Duh.
Here's when Old Saint Nick will be around:
• Nov. 4: 6-9 p.m.
• Nov. 5-Nov. 23: Mall hours (10 a.m.-9 p.m. from Monday through Saturday, and noon to 6 p.m. on Sunday)
• Nov. 24: Closed
• Nov. 25 and Nov. 26: 9 a.m.-9:30 p.m.
• Nov. 27: Noon-6 p.m.
• Nov. 28-Dec. 1: 10 a.m.-9 p.m.
• Dec. 2: 10 a.m.-9:30 p.m.
• Dec. 3: 9 a.m.-9:30 p.m.
• Dec. 4: 11 a.m.-7 p.m.
• Dec. 5-Dec. 9: 10 a.m.-9:30 p.m.
• Dec. 10: 9 a.m.-9:30 p.m.
• Dec. 11: 11 a.m.-8 p.m.
• Dec. 12-Dec. 16: 9 a.m.-9:30 p.m.
• Dec. 17: 8 a.m.-10 p.m.
• Dec. 18: 10 a.m-10 p.m.
• Dec. 19-Dec. 23: 8 a.m-10 p.m.
• Dec. 24: 8 a.m.-6 p.m.
There will be three Sunday pet photo nights:
• Nov. 13 and Nov. 27: 6-8 p.m.
• Dec. 11: 8-10 p.m.
There will also be two Sunday dates for children with disabilities:
• Nov. 20: 10:30 a.m.-noon
• Dec. 4: 9-11 a.m.
